pkgmetadata.longdescription: Barycenter Methods for Spatial Point Patterns // Computes a point pattern in R^2 or on a graph that is representative of a collection of many data patterns. The result is an approximate barycenter (also known as Frchet mean or prototype) based on a transport-transform metric. Possible choices include Optimal SubPattern Assignment (OSPA) and Spike Time metrics. Details can be found in Mller, Schuhmacher and Mateu (2019) arXiv:1909.07266.
